meaning: to give up; to let things fall apart; to stop trying; to throw in the towel
description: Expresses a mode of giving up, a passive attitude toward things. 开摆 (kāi bǎi) = 开始摆烂 means 「to enter give-up mode.」

examples.chinese: 放弃减肥摆烂了,胖怎么了!
examples.translation: Gave up on dieting, whatever! So what if I'm fat!

examples.chinese: 摆烂不会让生活更好,加油！冲鸭
examples.translation: Giving up won't make life better, keep pushing! Let's go!
Don't give up! Don't half-ass it
